member.name: UNDOCK_REASON
member.summary: Values that indicate the reason that a docked accessibility app window has been undocked. Used by .

member.name: UNDOCK_REASON.UR_RESOLUTION_CHANGE
member.summary: The accessibility window was undocked because the screen resolution has changed.

member.name: UNDOCK_REASON.UR_MONITOR_DISCONNECT
member.summary: The monitor on which the accessibility window was docked has been disconnected.
